Title: Sakurako-san no Ashimoto ni wa Shitai ga Umatteiru
Description: ['When Shoutarou Tatewaki first meets Sakurako Kujou, he knows his life will never be the same. Initially believing her to be responsible for a disappearance in the neighborhood, he later learns of her true talent: analyzing bone specimens. Sakurako has quite the collection of reconstructed animal bones, but she wishes she had more of the human variety, much to the chagrin of those around her.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' Soon, Shoutarou begins accompanying the eccentric osteologist on the many different unsolved cases she comes acrossâ€”usually in the form of decomposing bodies. But with so many incidents happening around them, could there be a larger mystery at work in their lives?', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', Sakurako-san no Ashimoto ni wa Shitai ga Umatteiru, ' is a story of two unlikely partners, each showing in their own way that bones can tell how one died, but only people can tell how they lived.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' [Written by MAL Rewrite]']
